mapper.select: select m_no from member where m_id=#{id}
select p_name from project where p_no=#{p_no}
select count(*) from support where del='n' and m_no=#{m_no}
select sup_no from support where m_no=#{m_no}
select * from (select rowNum rn,a.* from (select * from support where del='n' and m_no=#{m_no} order by sup_date desc)a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select opt_name from options where opt_code=#{string}
select opt_price from options where opt_code=#{string}
